high_descs: Turn left and cross the room towards the yellow chair.
Pick up the purple pillow on the left side of the chair.
Turn around, cross the room and hang a right at the white table to reach the tall lamp near the wall.
anns.task_desc: Examine a purple pillow by the light of a tall lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the yellow chair.
Pick up the pillow from the chair.
Turn around and walk until you get to the table, then turn left and go to the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow under the lamp.

high_descs: Move to the yellow chair with the purple cushion on top of it
pick up the purple cushion on top of the chair
carry the purple cushion to the floor lamp next to the sofa
anns.task_desc: Carry a purple cushion while turning on a lamp
